meanings.sent1: The armadas sailed bravely into battle.
meanings.sent2: The armadas patrolled the vast ocean.
meanings.sent3: The armadas decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The armadas stood strong like a wall against the enemy.
meanings.sent5: The armadas, with their mighty cannons, struck fear into their foes.

meanings.definition: A large group or collection of something.
meanings.sent1: An armadas of colorful balloons filled the sky.
meanings.sent2: The armadas of stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The armadas of ants worked together to carry the food.
meanings.sent4: The armadas of books in the library seemed endless.
meanings.sent5: The armadas of clouds gathered ominously before the storm.
